# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $135 for you. This is a fantastic opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to the usual market price. I'm confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
